issuer_name.reason: Top-left header text directly under the large 'Invoice' title reads 'Craigs' Landscaping' — typical issuer/seller placement.

issuer_address.reason: Multiline block under the issuer name (left column beneath company) contains two address lines; preserved line breaks as array.

issuer_phone.reason: Phone number appears in the header area to the right of the issuer name as '123-456-7890' (label proximity to issuer contact block).

issuer_email.reason: Email shown in header/contact block to the right of issuer name; lowercased for normalized_value.

issuer_website.reason: Website text appears beneath the email in the issuer contact area; normalized to a canonical URL form.

bill_to_name.reason: 'Bill To' blue block on the left shows 'Smith Enterprises' directly under the 'Bill To' heading — clear client name.

bill_to_address.reason: Address lines shown beneath the 'Bill To' heading in the light-blue block; preserved as array of lines.

bill_to_contact.reason: No explicit phone number or email is present in the 'Bill To' block; only name and address lines are shown.

invoice_number.reason: Inside the right side of the light-blue 'Invoice Details' block the label 'Invoice # 12345' displays the invoice identifier.

terms.reason: The 'Terms' line in the invoice details block reads 'Terms Net 30'.

invoice_date.reason: The invoice details block shows 'Invoice date 08/01/2024'; normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

due_date.reason: The invoice details block shows 'Due date 08/31/2024'; normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

items.reason: Tabular area with headers 'Product/Services', 'Qty/Hrs', 'Rate', 'Amount'. Two product/service rows visible: 'Stone work' and 'Mulching, weeding, planting' with corresponding quantities, rates and amounts. Quantities and monetary values normalized to numeric forms (quantities as numbers, unit_price and amount as numeric dollars).

subtotal.reason: Bottom-right totals block shows label 'Subtotal' with value '$650.00' directly adjacent.

discount.reason: Totals area lists 'Discount' with value '-$65.00' under Subtotal; negative sign retained and numeric normalized.

tax_rate.reason: Totals block shows label 'Tax 8.5%'; stored as percentage string and numeric percent (8.5) in normalized_value.

tax_amount.reason: Adjacent to the 'Tax 8.5%' label the monetary amount '$49.73' is shown; numeric normalized_value provided.

total.reason: Emphasized bottom-most 'Total' label shows '$634.73' as the final amount due; normalized to numeric value.

currency.reason: Dollar sign appears before all monetary amounts; currency normalized to 'USD'.

pay_to_name.reason: No 'Pay To' or bank/payment instruction block is present in this document image.

bank_account_name.reason: No 'Account Name' or similar bank account label is present in the visible invoice.

bank_account_number.reason: No 'Account No.' or bank account number appears on this invoice image.

payment_instructions.reason: No freeform payment instructions or bank details are present in the visible layout; only totals and contact info are shown.

document_title.reason: Large top-left title text clearly reads 'Invoice', indicating document type.

logo_or_brand.reason: A small decorative graphic appears in the top-right corner but no textual brand/logo name or extractable filename is present, so no logo text is extracted.

notes.reason: No additional notes, memos, or long terms text are present outside the labeled fields in this image.
